chapters.title: Chapter 7: A Matter of Thought
chapters.info: Queen Alliandre Maritha Kigarin, p. 155 (208)—Blessed of the Light, Queen of Ghealdan. She is the fourth person to sit on the throne of Ghealdan in the past seven months. She wears jewelry to her meetings with Masema for the sole purpose of giving it to him such that he will not ask for anything more; she also sent a letter to Rand offering him her friendship and asking for his help.
